means: 弄巧成拙的，不利于自己的企图的

sentence.Network_en: Narrowly self-interested behaviour is ultimately self-defeating.

sentence.Network_en: Paying children too much attention when they misbehave can be self-defeating.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子有不良行为时，小题大做可能适得其反。

entry.tran: 适得其反的;弄巧成拙的;事与愿违的
entry.def: A plan or action that is self-defeating is likely to cause problems or difficulties instead of producing useful results.

example.tran: 弄虚作假最终会自食其果。
适得其反的想法和行为模式

means.word_mean: 1. acting to defeat its own purpose;

sentences.sentence: "it is self-defeating...to ignore the progress of events"
